meanings.definition: A yoga pose in which the body is inverted and supported by the head.
meanings.sent1: During yoga class, Sarah practiced her headstand to improve her balance.
meanings.sent2: The instructor demonstrated the proper technique for a headstand.
meanings.sent3: In a headstand competition, the winner was the one who could hold the pose the longest.
meanings.sent4: Her headstand was as steady as a mountain peak against the sky.
meanings.sent5: The headstand position requires strength and focus to maintain.

meanings.sent1: I can't wait to headstand in front of my friends to show off my skills.
meanings.sent2: She decided to headstand for a minute as part of her daily exercise routine.
meanings.sent3: He headstands whenever he wants to impress his little sister.
meanings.sent4: The gymnast headstands effortlessly, showcasing her flexibility.
meanings.sent5: To headstand properly, remember to engage your core muscles.
